ProjectsArray.title: Metal Box VST3 Plugin
ProjectsArray.description: A cross-platform algorithimic reverb plugin built in C++ with JUCE. Featuring an offline RSA-based purchase validation system I developed using crypto++.

ProjectsArray.title: Mimetime VST3 Plugin
ProjectsArray.description: A software re-imagining of the EHX 16 Second Digital Delay pedal programmed in C++ with JUCE. UI developed with Javascript and React via WebView.

ProjectsArray.title: ACK! Retro RPG
ProjectsArray.description: A cross-platform retro RPG I made in Lua using the LOVE2D framework. Featuring a branching dialog system, complex enemy AI with LoS behavior, and original art, sound, and music.

ProjectsArray.title: Compugene
ProjectsArray.description: A looping audio recorder and processor for Windows. I designed the app and coded the underlying audio processing routines. Built in python using pydub and pyaudio.

ProjectsArray.title: Zone Zero
ProjectsArray.description: A web-hosted first-person stealth/horror game I built in Unity with C#. Co-developed with Tommy Nguyen.

ProjectsArray.title: SpyWire P2P
ProjectsArray.description: A lightweight p2p chat application I made in python using tkinter and the socket library.
